notes.text:
This update for procmail fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-16844: Heap-based buffer overflow in loadbuf function could lead to remote denial of service (bsc#1068648)

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in the loadbuf function in formisc.c in formail in procmail 3.22 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted e-mail message because of a hardcoded realloc size, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-3618.
notes.title: CVE description
